tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    city VARCHAR(255),
    date DATE,
    forecast VARCHAR(255),
    temperature INT,
    precipitation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE weather_forecast (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  temperature INT,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE historical_weather (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  average_temperature INT,
  max_temperature INT,
  min_temperature INT
);

CREATE TABLE historical_weather (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    average_temperature INT,
    max_temperature INT,
    min_temperature INT
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherForecast (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  temperature DECIMAL,
  weather_condition VARCHAR(50),
  city VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherForecast (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    city VARCHAR(255),
    temperature FLOAT,
    conditions TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE HistoricalWeather (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    city VARCHAR(255),
    min_temperature FLOAT,
    max_temperature FLOAT,
    precipitation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE PlanningData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    city VARCHAR(255),
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    notes TEXT
);
